cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha.title: up_alpha
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha.description: Alpha features. Commands may be removed in future releases.

cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migration.title: up_alpha_migration
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migration.description: Migrate control planes to Upbound Managed Control Planes.

cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migration_ex.title: up_alpha_migration_export
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migration_ex.description: The 'export' command is used to export the current state of a Crossplane or Universal Crossplane (xp/uxp) control plane into an archive file. This file can then be used for migration to Upbound Managed Control Planes.

cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migration_im.title: up_alpha_migration_import
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migration_im.description: The 'import' command imports a control plane state from an archive file into an Upbound managed control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migration_pa.title: up_alpha_migration_pause-toggle
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migration_pa.description: The 'pause-toggle' command is used to pause or unpause resources affected by a migration, ensuring that only migration-induced pauses are undone.

cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_billin.title: up_alpha_space_billing_export
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_billin.description: Export a billing report for submission to Upbound.

cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_connec.title: up_alpha_space_connect_(attach)
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_connec.description: Connect an Upbound Space to the Upbound web console.

cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_discon.title: up_alpha_space_disconnect_(detach)
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_discon.description: Disconnect an Upbound Space from the Upbound web console.

cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_list.title: up_alpha_space_list
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_list.description: List all accessible spaces in Upbound.

cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_mirror.title: up_alpha_space_mirror
cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_mirror.description: Managing the mirroring of artifacts to local storage or private container registries.

cli-reference/yaml/up_composition_render.title: up_composition_render
cli-reference/yaml/up_composition_render.description: Run a composition locally to render an XR into composed resources.

cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).title: up_controlplane_(ctp)
cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).description: Interact with control planes in the current context, both in the cloud and in a local Space.

cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).title: up_controlplane_(ctp)_connect
cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).description: Deprecated: Connect kubectl to control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).title: up_controlplane_(ctp)_connector
cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).description: Connect an App Cluster to a control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).title: up_controlplane_(ctp)_connector_install
cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).description: Install mcp-connector into an App Cluster.

cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).title: up_controlplane_(ctp)_connector_uninstall
cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).description: Uninstall mcp-connector from an App Cluster.

cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).title: up_controlplane_(ctp)_disconnect
cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).description: Deprecated: Disconnect kubectl from control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).title: up_controlplane_(ctp)_list
cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).description: List control planes for the organization.

cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).title: up_controlplane_(ctp)_simulation_(sim)_create
cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).description: Start a new control plane simulation and wait for the results.

cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).title: up_controlplane_(ctp)_simulation_(sim)_list
cli-reference/yaml/up_controlplane_(ctp).description: List control plane simulations for the account.

cli-reference/yaml/up_dependency_(dep)_a.title: up_dependency_(dep)_add
cli-reference/yaml/up_dependency_(dep)_a.description: Add a dependency to the current project.

cli-reference/yaml/up_dependency_(dep)_u.title: up_dependency_(dep)_update-cache
cli-reference/yaml/up_dependency_(dep)_u.description: Update the dependency cache for the current project.

cli-reference/yaml/up_example_generate.title: up_example_generate
cli-reference/yaml/up_example_generate.description: Generate an Example Claim (XRC) or Composite Resource (XR).

cli-reference/yaml/up_function_generate.title: up_function_generate
cli-reference/yaml/up_function_generate.description: Generate an Function for a Composition.

cli-reference/yaml/up_login.title: up_login
cli-reference/yaml/up_login.description: Login to Upbound. Will attempt to launch a web browser by default. Use --username and --password flags for automations.

cli-reference/yaml/up_organization_(org).title: up_organization_(org)_token
cli-reference/yaml/up_organization_(org).description: Generates an organization-scoped token to authenticate with a Cloud space.

cli-reference/yaml/up_organization_(org).title: up_organization_(org)_user_invite
cli-reference/yaml/up_organization_(org).description: Invite a user to the organization.

cli-reference/yaml/up_organization_(org).title: up_organization_(org)_user_remove
cli-reference/yaml/up_organization_(org).description: Remove a member from the organization.

cli-reference/yaml/up_profile_create.title: up_profile_create
cli-reference/yaml/up_profile_create.description: Create a new Upbound Profile without logging in.

cli-reference/yaml/up_profile_use.title: up_profile_use
cli-reference/yaml/up_profile_use.description: Select an Upbound Profile as the default.

cli-reference/yaml/up_profile_view.title: up_profile_view
cli-reference/yaml/up_profile_view.description: View the Upbound Profile settings across profiles.

cli-reference/yaml/up_project_build.title: up_project_build
cli-reference/yaml/up_project_build.description: Build a project into a Crossplane package.

cli-reference/yaml/up_project_move.title: up_project_move
cli-reference/yaml/up_project_move.description: Update the repository for a project

cli-reference/yaml/up_project_push.title: up_project_push
cli-reference/yaml/up_project_push.description: Push a project's packages to the Upbound Marketplace.

cli-reference/yaml/up_project_run.title: up_project_run
cli-reference/yaml/up_project_run.description: Run a project on a development control plane for testing.

cli-reference/yaml/up_project_simulate.title: up_project_simulate
cli-reference/yaml/up_project_simulate.description: Run a project as a simulation against an existing control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up_project_simulation.title: up_project_simulation_complete
cli-reference/yaml/up_project_simulation.description: Force complete an in-progress project simulation

cli-reference/yaml/up_project_simulation.title: up_project_simulation_create
cli-reference/yaml/up_project_simulation.description: Start a new project simulation and wait for the results.

cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.title: up_repository_(repo)_get
cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.description: Get a repository for the account.

cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.title: up_repository_(repo)_permission
cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.description: Manage permissions of a repository for a team in the account.

cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.title: up_repository_(repo)_permission_grant
cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.description: Grant repository permission for a team.

cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.title: up_repository_(repo)_permission_list
cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.description: List all repository permissions for teams.

cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.title: up_repository_(repo)_permission_revoke
cli-reference/yaml/up_repository_(repo)_.description: Revoke repository permission from a team.

cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_get.title: up_robot_get
cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_get.description: Get a robot for the account.

cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_team_join.title: up_robot_team_join
cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_team_join.description: Add the robot to a team.

cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_team_leave.title: up_robot_team_leave
cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_team_leave.description: Remove the robot from a team.

cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_team_list.title: up_robot_team_list
cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_team_list.description: List all teams the robot is a member of.

cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_token_create.title: up_robot_token_create
cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_token_create.description: Create a token for the robot.

cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_token_delete.title: up_robot_token_delete
cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_token_delete.description: Delete a token for the robot.

cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_token_get.title: up_robot_token_get
cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_token_get.description: Get a token for the robot.

cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_token_list.title: up_robot_token_list
cli-reference/yaml/up_robot_token_list.description: List the tokens for the robot.

cli-reference/yaml/up_space_billing_expo.title: up_space_billing_export
cli-reference/yaml/up_space_billing_expo.description: Export a billing report for submission to Upbound.

cli-reference/yaml/up_space_connect_(att.title: up_space_connect_(attach)
cli-reference/yaml/up_space_connect_(att.description: Connect an Upbound Space to the Upbound web console.

cli-reference/yaml/up_space_disconnect_(.title: up_space_disconnect_(detach)
cli-reference/yaml/up_space_disconnect_(.description: Disconnect an Upbound Space from the Upbound web console.

cli-reference/yaml/up_space_list.title: up_space_list
cli-reference/yaml/up_space_list.description: List all accessible spaces in Upbound.

cli-reference/yaml/up_space_mirror.title: up_space_mirror
cli-reference/yaml/up_space_mirror.description: Managing the mirroring of artifacts to local storage or private container registries.

cli-reference/yaml/up_test.title: up_test
cli-reference/yaml/up_test.description: Manage and run tests for projects.

cli-reference/yaml/up_test_generate.title: up_test_generate
cli-reference/yaml/up_test_generate.description: Generate a Test for a project.

cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg.title: up_xpkg
cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg.description: Deprecated. Please migrate to up project or use the crossplane CLI.

cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg_append.title: up_xpkg_append
cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg_append.description: Append additional files to an xpkg.

cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg_batch.title: up_xpkg_batch
cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg_batch.description: Batch build and push a family of service-scoped provider packages.

cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg_build.title: up_xpkg_build
cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg_build.description: Build a package, by default from the current directory.

cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg_xp-extract.title: up_xpkg_xp-extract
cli-reference/yaml/up_xpkg_xp-extract.description: Extract package contents into a Crossplane cache compatible format. Fetches from a remote registry by default.

cli-reference/yaml/up_xpls_serve.title: up_xpls_serve
cli-reference/yaml/up_xpls_serve.description: run a server for Crossplane definitions using the Language Server Protocol.

cli-reference/yaml/up_xrd.title: up_xrd
cli-reference/yaml/up_xrd.description: Manage XRDs from Composite Resources(XR) or Claims(XRC).

cli-reference/yaml/up_xrd_generate.title: up_xrd_generate
cli-reference/yaml/up_xrd_generate.description: Generate an XRD from a Composite Resource (XR) or Claim (XRC).
